title: "\"An incredible and humbling honour\" North East Doctor is awarded an MBE in recognition of his work"
excerpt: "A North-East doctor has been awarded an Honorary MBE in recognition of his work for the NHS. Dr Shafie Kamaruddin, deputy medical director, at County Durham and Darlington NHS Foundation Trust is described as an 'excellent clinician and leader who played a crucial role' at the start of the pandemic in early 2020."
